AdServer.brief: version 2.0.0.0 configuration for moscow-test-central colocation released at 2012-06-29 18:03:49

Service.name: keyscan-Scanner
Service.keyscan_hosts: nnode0 nnode1 nnode3 nnode2 nnode4 nnode5

Service.name: fe1-UserInfoChecker
Service.start_cmd: export PERL5LIB=$PERL5LIB:/opt/foros/server/manager/moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323/lib ; /opt/oix/server/manager/moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323/bin/ConfigureUserChunks.pl check --chunks-count=10 --target-hosts='nnode0,nnode1,nnode2,nnode3,' --chunks-root='/opt/oix/server/var/cache/Users1/' --transport='ssh:/home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' --check-hosts='nnode0,nnode1,nnode2,nnode3,nnode4,nnode5,' --xml-out=/tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% nnode0:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% nnode1:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% nnode3:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% nnode2:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% nnode4:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml && rsync -e 'ssh -i /home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' /tmp/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml.%%SMS_UNIQUE%% nnode5:/opt/oix/server/var/run/UserInfoDistribution.1.xml || ( EX=$? ; if [ $EX -eq 1 ] ; then eval 'echo -e %%SMS_COLOR_ERROR%%redistribution required%%SMS_COLOR_PLAIN%%' && exit 1 ; else exit -1 ; fi ; )

Service.name: fe1-UserInfoDistributor
Service.start_cmd: export PERL5LIB=$PERL5LIB:/opt/foros/server/manager/moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323/lib ; /opt/oix/server/manager/moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323/bin/ConfigureUserChunks.pl reconf --chunks-count=10 --target-hosts='nnode0,nnode1,nnode2,nnode3,' --chunks-root='/opt/oix/server/var/cache/Users1/' --transport='ssh:/home/aduser/.ssh/adkey.moscow-test-central-2.0.0.0-cms20120629140323' --check-hosts='nnode0,nnode1,nnode2,nnode3,nnode4,nnode5,' --force=%%force%% --check-hosts=%%check-hosts%%

Service.name: troubleshoot-Collector
